import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import "react-responsive-carousel/lib/styles/carousel.min.css"; export default function GameDetails() { // carousel const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); }; // carousel let { gameId } = useParams(); let [gameObject, setGame] = useState({}); async function getGamedeatails(id) { let { data } = await axios.get(`https://free-to-play-games-database.p.rapidapi.com/api/game`,{ params: { id }, headers: { 'X-RapidAPI-Key':'b52128808dmsh5826403ec30ac21p1b9548jsnfca5769e0b68', 'X-RapidAPI-Host':'free-to-play-games-database.p.rapidapi.com' } },gameObject); console.log(data); setGame(data); } useEffect(() => { getGamedeatails(gameId); }, []) return (
